trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: The warrior’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
trait.text: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: The warrior’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind
trait.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level. If it does so, it can’t use this feature again until it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Martial Role: Attacker
trait.text: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

monster.name: Sidekick: Warrior (Defender) 19
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Unstoppable Force
trait.text: If the warrior's total for a strength check is less than the warrior's strength score, the score can be used in place of the total.

trait.name: Improved Defense
trait.text: The warrior’s AC increases by 1.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
trait.text: The warrior can reroll a saving throw that it fails but must use the new result.

trait.name: Battle Readiness
trait.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Superior Critical
trait.text: The warrior’s attack rolls now score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

trait.name: Second Wind (2 uses)
trait.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level. It can use this feature twice before needing to finish a short or long rest.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + 5 slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
reaction.text: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn’t the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Sidekick: Expert 13
monster.skill: Acrobatics +16, Performance +8, Persuasion +8, Sleight of Hand +10, Stealth +15
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Reliable Talent
trait.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

trait.name: Extra Attack
trait.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

trait.name: Helpful
trait.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack’s damage roll against one target.

trait.name: Tools
trait.text: The expert has thieves’ tools and a musical instrument.

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On the expert’s turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

trait.name: Stroke of Luck
trait.text: The expert has an uncanny knack for succeeding when they need to. If their attack misses a target within range, they can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if they fail an ability check, they can treat the d20 roll as a 20.
The expert can use this ability once per day.

monster.name: Sidekick: Spellcaster (Mage) 13
monster.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The spellcaster’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, hold monster
6th level (1 slot): chain lightning
7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball

monster.spells: Fire Bolt, Light, Sleep, Burning Hands, Shield, Mage Hand, Invisibility, Minor Illusion, Flaming Sphere, Fireball, Fly, Wall of Fire, Polymorph, Cone of Cold, Shocking Grasp, Hold Monster, Chain Lightning, Delayed Blast Fireball

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.text: The spellcaster can increase the power of their simpler spells. When the spellcaster casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, the spellcaster can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: The spellcaster’s spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 19, +11 to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): sleep, burning hands, shield
2nd level (3 slots): invisibility, flaming sphere
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): wall of fire, polymorph
5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, hold monster, telekinesis
6th level (1 slot): chain lightning, circle of death
7th level (1 slot): delayed blast fireball
8th level (1 slot): incendiary cloud
9th level (1 slot): meteor swarm
